tags.name: kemet-drawer
tags.description: A component that adds an off-canvas menu with different effects.

properties.name: effect
properties.description: The animation effect for opening and closing the drawer. Values include: (slide|reveal|push|scale|door)

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Determines if the drawer is opened or not.

properties.name: side
properties.description: Allows you to control which side the drawer opens from. Values include: (left|right)

cssProperties.name: --kemet-drawer-width
cssProperties.description: The width of the drawer. Default is 300px.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-drawer-height
cssProperties.description: The height of the drawer. Deafult is 100%.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-drawer-color
cssProperties.description: The text color of the drawer. Default is #fafafa.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-drawer-background
cssProperties.description: The background color of the drawer. Default is #202020.
